title: Morristown National Historical Park: Park Fun
body: Park Fun           Cover of Junior Ranger booklet NPS  Morristown National Historical Park is happy to help educate children about the natural, historical, and cultural aspects of the park. Stop by the Visitor Center or the Museum gift shop and ask the Ranger at the desk for a park- Junior Ranger booklet, which includes a scavenger hunt, a maze, a crossword puzzle, word searches, and other fun things. Kids can complete activities in the booklet and become a Junior Ranger. Or maybe you like to try an on line park activities like a word search, a crossword puzzle how about a recipe used by the revolutionary soldiers. . Kids can find other fun activities on the Web Ranger site click here.
